issue.title: 'The view file does not exist: '
issue.body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?

```
yii2-advanced

./yii mongodb-migrate/create create_users_collection
```
### What's expected?

Migration in console/migrations
### What do you get instead?

```
`Create new migration '/var/www/console/migrations/m160404_084614_create_users_collection.php'? (yes|no) [no]:y
Exception 'yii\base\InvalidParamException' with message 'The view file does not exist: '

in /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/View.php:226

Stack trace:
#0 /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/Controller.php(420): yii\base\View->renderFile(NULL, Array, Object(yii\mongodb\console\controllers\MigrateController))
#1 /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/console/controllers/BaseMigrateController.php(531): yii\base\Controller->renderFile(NULL, Array)
#2 [internal function]: yii\console\controllers\BaseMigrateController->actionCreate('create_users_co...')
#3 /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/InlineAction.php(55): call_user_func_array(Array, Array)
#4 /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/Controller.php(154): yii\base\InlineAction->runWithParams(Array)
#5 /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/console/Controller.php(108): yii\base\Controller->runAction('create', Array)
#6 /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/Module.php(454): yii\console\Controller->runAction('create', Array)
#7 /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/console/Application.php(167): yii\base\Module->runAction('mongodb-migrate...', Array)
#8 /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/console/Application.php(143): yii\console\Application->runAction('mongodb-migrate...', Array)
#9 /var/www/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/Application.php(375): yii\console\Application->handleRequest(Object(yii\console\Request))
#10 /var/www/yii(27): yii\base\Application->run()
#11 {main}
```
### Additional info

| Q | A |
| --- | --- |
| Yii vesion | 2 |
| PHP version |  |
| Operating system |  |

issue.title: Fixes #11280 migrate autogenerate breaks MongoDB migration

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q | A |
| --- | --- |
| Is bugfix? | yes |
| New feature? | no |
| Breaks BC? | partially: breaks comparing to 2.0.7, but restores comparing to 2.0.6 |
| Tests pass? | yes |
| Fixed issues | #11280 |

body:
Before i have same issue but I fixed it with this solution:

``` php
    'controllerMap' => [
        'mongodb-migrate' => [
            'class' => 'yii\mongodb\console\controllers\MigrateController',
            'migrationPath' => '@app/migrations/mongodb'
        ]
    ],
```

and for generate migration:

```
php yii mongodb-migrate/create user_collection
```

MongoDB migration going to mongodb folder under migrations folder.
@jafaripur have you tried it with yii 2.0.7?
@Faryshta Yes, I use latest Yii2 master
